alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 7:42PM CDT until June 30 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Jefferson County in south central Illinois... Northern Franklin County in south central Illinois... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sesser, or near Rend Lake Area, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rend Lake Area, Sesser, Ina, Bonnie, Ewing and Nason. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
